mapper.insert: insert into reservation(resDate,shopNo,hallNo,uiNo,payCaNo,payPrice,currentStatus) values(now(), (select shopNo from hall where hallNo=#{hallNo}), #{hallNo}, #{uiNo}, #{payCaNo}, #{payPrice},1);

insert into reservationmenu(resMenuCnt, menuPrice_Log, menuName_Log, resNo, menuNo) values(#{resMenuCnt}, (select menuPrice from menu where menuNo=#{menuNo}), (select menuName from menu where menuNo=#{menuNo}), (select resNo from reservation where hallNo=#{hallNo} and currentStatus=1), #{menuNo});
mapper.select: select s.shopName, s.shopNo, s.shopAddress, s.shopHP, group_concat(distinct concat(rm.menuName_Log,'(',rm.menuPrice_Log,'원) ',rm.resMenuCnt,'개') separator ' , ') menuName, cast(r.resDate as char) as resDate, r.payPrice, p.payType, h.seatCnt, r.currentStatus, r.resNo, h.hallNo, h.hallStatus from shop s, reservation r, user_info u, menu m, reservationmenu rm, hall h, pay_category p where r.uiNo=#{uiNo} and r.shopNo=s.shopNo and rm.menuNo=m.menuNo and rm.resNo=r.resNo and r.PayCaNo=p.PayCaNo and r.hallNo=h.hallNo group by resNo order by s.shopName;
mapper.delete: delete from reservationmenu where resNo in (select resNo from reservation where uiNo=#{uiNo} and currentStatus=1);
delete from reservation where uiNo=#{uiNo} and currentStatus=1;
mapper.update: update reservation set currentStatus=0 where uiNo=#{uiNo} and resNo=#{resNo};
